snippet: Mark Prior, a successful starter with the Chicago Cubs until injuries disabled him in 2006, is pitching for the Pawtucket Red Sox in an attempt to resurrect his career as a short reliever.
abstract: Profile of pitcher Mark Prior, a successful starter with the Chicago Cubs until injuries disabled him in 2006; Prior is pitching for the Pawtucket Red Sox in the minors in an attempt to resurrect his career as a short reliever.
lead_paragraph: Mark Prior, a successful starter with the Chicago Cubs until injuries disabled him in 2006, is pitching for the Pawtucket Red Sox in an attempt to resurrect his career as a short reliever.

headline.seo: Prior Still Trying to Return to Majors
headline.main: 6 Years Later, Still Striving to Get Back to the Majors
headline.print_headline: Nearly Six Years Later, Still Striving To Return to the Major Leagues
